use_cases.title: UC1 - Verification email with invalid token
use_cases.goal: Ensure the system correctly handles invalid verification tokens
preconditions: User has signed up and received a verification link
steps: User signs up and receives verification link
Replace the token in the received verification URL with an invalid token
Attempt to verify the email using the modified URL
expected_results: Verification fails with a clear error state
User is prompted to request a new verification link

use_cases.title: UC2 - Verification email token expired
use_cases.goal: To validate the system's response when a verification token has expired
preconditions: User has signed up and received a verification link
steps: Sign up and obtain verification link/token
Wait until token expiry time (24 hours) or simulate expiry if supported
Attempt to verify email using the expired link
expected_results: CTA to resend verification link is available and functional
boundary_cases: Verification token exactly at expiry time (24 hours)

use_cases.title: UC3 - Boundary: Max email length during signup
use_cases.goal: To ensure signup form properly validates and accepts an email at its maximum allowed length
steps: Enter an email at maximum allowed length (254 characters)
expected_results: Signup form accepts the email if within 254 characters
Validation error if the email length exceeds 254 characters

assumptions: Assuming the maximum email length allowed is 254 characters as per documentation and common standards
Assuming token expiry time functionality is supported and set to 24 hours
